ModMetaData.name: Capra Race (카프라종족) Mod
ModMetaData.author: ssm9906
ModMetaData.description:
카프라 종족모드입니다, 우주의 고프닉들을 만나보세요...
버그 제보나 피드백은 토론혹은 댓글로 부탁트립니다.
Recommendation
Hats Display Selection - [https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542291825] [KV] Show Hair With Hats or Hide All Hats - [https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1180826364] Apparel BodyType Resolver [https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2037354634]
Provide Mode : Additional Verb Mod - NukaFrog Apparel BodyType Resolver - gguake
Thanks For everyone in RimWorld Korea Discord
